sentences.en: " Well, he certainly must have strained himself to get this menagerie together. "
sentences.cn: “ 我说, 他一定花了很大的气力才搜罗到这么一大帮牛头马面. ”

sentences.en: Hey, Beethoven: Get a full-time job, a part-time business, a spouse, a few kids, and a menagerie of pets and wait till you see how many symphonies you can crank out!
sentences.cn: 嘿，贝多芬：找到一个全职工作，兼职经商，一个配偶，几个孩子，和一个动物园的宠物，然后等待看你能够制造出多少交响乐。

sentences.en: Menagerie , Laura Wingfield suffers severe inferiority complex caused by her physical disability.
sentences.cn: 温费尔德由于身体残疾而产生了严重的自卑情结.

sentences.en: The 18-year-old studied animal management before taking a full-time role looking after her parents giant menagerie which houses more than 120 animals.
sentences.cn: 这个18岁的女孩在她父母豢养了超过120只动物的大动物园里全职工作，在此之前，她学习动物管理学。

sentences.en: The coffers were filled not only with the standard treasures and artifacts but a menagerie of wild African animals including ostriches and giraffes to be sent back to the emperor.
sentences.cn: 这样，船队中不只是装着金银珠宝和工艺品，还有小型动物园，里面有来自非洲的动物，如鸵鸟和长颈鹿都被带到南京，敬献给皇帝。

sentences.en: The office is a menagerie of egotists and sycophants.
sentences.cn: 该办公室乃是自私者与谄媚者汇集之处.

sentences.en: They followed it this time, as eager as children in sight of a circus menagerie.
sentences.cn: 这一次他们跟着它前进了, 那种迫切的心情就象孩子见了马戏团里巡回动物园一样.

words.tran_cn: 动物园；动物展览；（马戏团豢养的）兽群
